description: This file contains code for initializing a knowledge base with documents, setting up a vector database, and querying the knowledge base with filters, specifically related to loading JSON documents, managing metadata, and using an agent to perform filtered searches.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing a LanceDB vector database, used for storing and retrieving vector data.

classes.name: JSONKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class for managing a knowledge base backed by JSON documents and a vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class for performing queries and interactions with the knowledge base, including filtering capabilities.

methods.name: load_document
methods.description: Loads a document into the knowledge base with associated metadata, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the response from the agent based on a query, with optional markdown formatting.
